title: Mantle
summary: The Mantle is a hauler-class ship of the Cloak line. It is best suited as a fast and stealthy hauler
full_text:
Mantle
The Mantle is a hauler-class ship of the Cloak line. It is best suited as a fast and stealthy hauler
